name: NovaScape
blurb: Test your reflexes and your will to survive as you escape the incoming Supernova! Do you have what it takes to NovaScape?

rewards.reward:
*THE KICKSTARTER*
==============================

A sincere Thank You! Your pledge will help us Kickstart NovaScape and take this game to the next level. Every little bit helps, and we appreciate your pledge. Once again thank your for helping us Kickstart NovaScape.

*SUPPORTER*
==============================

Thank you for Supporting NovaScape! You will receive an Invitation to download a COPY OF NOVASCAPE upon release + you will also be granted early access to Exclusive info and updates every step of the way. You will watch NovaScape unfold right before your eyes. Thank you for Supporting NovaScape!

*EARLY BIRD NOVASCAPE SPECIAL*\r\n==============================\r\nThe First 2500 to Pledge at this level will get to download NovaScape before anybody else! You will receive a special invitation to gain access to a special launch date! Shhhh! its a secret tho.. I will send you the date and release time upon completion of KickStarter.

*TRUE BELIEVER*
==============================
You are a True Believer and will receive a Custom NovaScape USB FLASH DRIVE + an Invitation to download a COPY OF NOVASCAPE! The Flash Drive will contain a PDF including: Development Notes + Exclusive NovaScape Art  and Concept Images + a Digital Soundtrack!
==============================
This tier also includes the previously mentioned level so your name will appear in the Credits Section + you will be granted Exclusive Access to info and updates. Thank you for being a True Believer!

*OVER ACHIEVER*
==============================
You have gone above and beyond you Over Achiever, THANK YOU for going the extra mile with NovaScape! Your reward is an exclusive Kickstarter only NovaScape T-Shirt!
==============================
This tier also includes all previously mentioned levels so you will receive an Invitation to download a COPY OF NOVASCAPE + USB Flash Drive + your name will appear in the Credits Section + you will be granted Exclusive Access to info and updates. Thanks again.. you Over Achiever...

*NOVASCAPE ENTHUSIAST*
============================== 
You believe in NovaScape and are Enthusiastic to support us! Cant say thank you enough for your pledge, you will receive a LIMITED EDITION NovaScape Poster!
==============================
At this pledge level you not only get the limited edition poster, you are rewarded with an Invitation to download a COPY OF NOVASCAPE + USB Flash Drive + your name will appear in the Credits Section + Exclusive Access to info and updates.

*MULTI-PACKAGE*
==============================
Your taking your pledge to the next level so were gonna take your reward their also. You get the
Kickstarter only NovaScape T-Shirt + LIMITED EDITION NovaScape Poster! You deserve the Multi-Package enjoy it!
=============================
Since this is a limited pledge tier you will only receive an Invitation to download a COPY OF NOVASCAPE + get your name in the Credits! Once again thank you for believing in NovaScape, you pledge will help my dream come true and get this game out for all to enjoy!

*SUPERNOVA CHALLENGE*
IPHONE 4
==============================
You have decided to take the Supernova head on! Therefor you reward is a Limited Edition NovaScape IPHONE 4 CASE!!! These are a Quality 2 Part Case-Mate phone case! 
==============================
This is an Exclusive Tier and only the COPY OF NOVASCAPE upon release is included.

*SUPERNOVA CHALLENGE*
IPHONE 5
==============================
You have decided to take the Supernova head on! Therefor you reward is a Limited Edition NovaScape IPHONE 5 CASE!!! These are a Quality 2 Part Case-Mate phone case! 
==============================
This is an Exclusive Tier and only the COPY OF NOVASCAPE upon release is included.

*SUPERNOVA SURVIVOR*\r\n==============================\r\nNot only have you faced the SuperNova.. you have escaped and Survived! You will live to tell the tales of your adventure and you deserve a Great Reward! You will receive ALL THE PREVIOUS TIERS! You get an Invitation to Download NovaScape + iPhone Case + T-Shirt + Poster + USB Flash Drive + Name in Credits + Exclusive Info and Updates! You earned it!

*ALL IN*
==============================
What's this? You have decided to go ALL IN? Is this is even possible?... What now? Since you've escaped the SuperNova what is your reward? Ahh yes.. The SHIP IS YOURS! You will be able to DESIGN your own NovaScape ship that will be playable in game for all to witness your greatness! Send me your design, rough sketch or even just an idea and I will make it happen!
============================
Since you went ALL IN so will I, You get EVERYTHING mentioned on this Kickstarter. You get to Design your own ship + Copy of Novascape + iPhone Case + T-Shirt + Poster + USB Flash Drive + Name in Credits + Exclusive Info and Updates! Cant thank you enough for your pledge.. THANK YOU!
